ri:Resource.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.ivoa.net/xml/RegistryInterface/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/registry/RegistryInterface/v1.0/RegistryInterface.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOResource/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VOResource/v1.0/VOResource.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VODataService/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/VODataService/v1.0/VODataService.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/VOTable/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-formats/VOTable/v1.0/VOTable.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/ConeSearch/v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/ConeSearch/v1.0/ConeSearch.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SIA/v1.1 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SIA/v1.1/SIA.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/SSA/v0.4 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/SSA/v0.4/SSA.xsd urn:astrogrid:schema:vo-resource-types:STAP:v1.0 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/STAP/v1.0/STAP.xsd http://www.ivoa.net/xml/CEA/v1.0rc1 http://software.astrogrid.org/schema/vo-resource-types/CEAService/v1.0rc1/CEAService.xsd
ri:Resource.title: SuperCOSMOS Science Archive (SSA)

curation.publisher: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

creator.name: WFAU, Institute for Astronomy, University of Edinburgh

content.subject: Digitised photographic optical all-sky photometric astrometric survey
content.description: The SuperCOSMOS data held in the SSA primarily originate from scans of Palomar and UK Schmidt blue, red and near-IR southern sky surveys. The ESO Schmidt R (dec < -17.5) and Palomar POSS-I E (dec > -17.5) surveys have also been scanned and provide a 1st epoch red measurement. Further details on the surveys, the scanning process and the raw parameters extracted can be found on the further information link. The SSA is housed in a relational database running on Microsoft SQL Server 2000. Data are stored in tables which are inter-linked via reference ID numbers. In addition to the astronomical object catalogues these tables also contain information on the plates that were scanned, survey field centres and calibration coefficients. Most user science queries will only need to access the SOURCE table or to a lesser extent the DETECTION table.

capability.description: Detection table: cone search of detections from all plate measurements in all bands
Source table: cone search of single band merged source catalog
Access to two applications: general ADQL query, and asynchronous cone-search where relevant/enabled.

column.name: systemID
column.description: The system of survey fields used for the survey

column.name: name
column.description: The name of the system, eg. "ESO/SRC", "POSS-I" etc.

column.name: centrePitch
column.description: The pitch of the field centres

column.name: surveyID
column.description: Unique survey identifier in the SSA

column.name: surveyName
column.description: Survey name, eg. SERC-J/EJ

column.name: systemID
column.description: The system of survey fields used for the survey

column.name: fieldOfView
column.description: The nominal field of view of each survey plate

column.name: decMin
column.description: Southern (Dec) limit of survey

column.name: decMax
column.description: Northern (Dec) limit of survey

column.name: numFields
column.description: No. of fields in the survey

column.name: telescope
column.description: UK, ESO or Palomar Oschin Schmidt

column.name: telAperture
column.description: Telescope aperture

column.name: telLong
column.description: Telescope longitude

column.name: telLat
column.description: Telescope latitude

column.name: telHeight
column.description: Telescope altitude

column.name: plateScale
column.description: Nominal plate scale

column.name: colour
column.description: Survey colour, eg. blue, red or near-infrared

column.name: waveMin
column.description: Approximate minimum wavelength

column.name: waveMax
column.description: Approximate maximum wavelength

column.name: waveEff
column.description: Approximate effective wavelength

column.name: magLimit
column.description: Nominal mag limit of survey, eg. 22.5 for Bj

column.name: epochMin
column.description: Minimum epoch of observations

column.name: epochMax
column.description: Maximum epoch of observations

column.name: epTsys
column.description: Time system for epoch values in SurveyCatalog

column.name: equinox
column.description: Equinox for positions in SurveyCatalog

column.name: eqTsys
column.description: Time system for equinox in SurveyCatalog

column.name: surveyRef
column.description: Literature reference for survey

column.name: plateID
column.description: Unique identifier of the plate: surveyID plus field number combo

column.name: surveyID
column.description: Every plate comes from a survey

column.name: fieldID
column.description: Unique survey field identifier

column.name: plateNum
column.description: Plate number assigned by observatory

column.name: dateMeas
column.description: Measurement date

column.name: timeMeas
column.description: Measurement time (local), eg. 15:33:47

column.name: instrument
column.description: Name of scanning machine

column.name: softVersion
column.description: Software version, eg. /home/scosdev/v033

column.name: operator
column.description: Machine operator's username

column.name: scanMaterial
column.description: Photographic medium, eg. Original glass, Copy film, Copy glass

column.name: emulsion
column.description: Kodak emulsion type, eg. 103a-E, IIIa-J, IV-N

column.name: filterID
column.description: Filter identifier, eg. OG590, RG715, 2444...

column.name: filterComm
column.description: Filter type, eg. "Schott glass", "Red plexiglass"...

column.name: raPnt
column.description: Mean plate centre RA

column.name: decPnt
column.description: Mean plate centre Dec

column.name: radecSys
column.description: Co-ordinate system of raPnt/decPnt, eg. FK4

column.name: equinox
column.description: Equinox of raPnt and decPnt

column.name: eqTsys
column.description: Time system of equinox, eg. BESSELIAN

column.name: utDateObs
column.description: UT date of observation

column.name: lstObs
column.description: Local sidefloat time at start of exposure, eg. 2336

column.name: expLength
column.description: Exposure time

column.name: epoch
column.description: Epoch of observation

column.name: domeTemp
column.description: Dome temp at observation

column.name: domePressure
column.description: Dome pressure at observation

column.name: domeHumid
column.description: Dome relative humidity at obsevation time

column.name: waveEffect
column.description: Effective wavelength

column.name: tropl
column.description: Tropospheric lapse rate

column.name: mjd
column.description: Modified Julian Date at mid exposure

column.name: focusNX
column.description: No. of scan focus points in X

column.name: focusNY
column.description: No. of scan focus points in Y

column.name: calType
column.description: Intensity calibration wedge fit type, eg. SPLINE

column.name: stepWdg
column.description: Intensity calibration step-wedge type, eg. kpno

column.name: nSteps
column.description: No. of intensity calibration wedge steps

column.name: orientation
column.description: SuperCOSMOS plate orientation, eg. news

column.name: emulpos
column.description: SuperCOSMOS emulsion position, eg. up

column.name: sosp
column.description: SuperCOSMOS start of scan CCD pixel number

column.name: stepsize
column.description: SuperCOSMOS nominal pixel size

column.name: scanlen
column.description: SuperCOSMOS CCD lane scan length

column.name: aXmin
column.description: SuperCOSMOS XMIN of measured area

column.name: aXmax
column.description: SuperCOSMOS XMAX of measured area

column.name: aYmin
column.description: SuperCOSMOS YMIN of measured area

column.name: aYmax
column.description: SuperCOSMOS YMAX of measured area

column.name: xPnt
column.description: Centre of scan area in X

column.name: yPnt
column.description: Centre of scan area in Y

column.name: areaCut
column.description: Minimum area of detected object

column.name: apParam
column.description: Afloat profile parameter

column.name: dbParam
column.description: Deblending parameter

column.name: dbAmin
column.description: Minimum area of parent image that can be deblended

column.name: dbAmax
column.description: Maximum area of parent image that can be deblended

column.name: dbAcut
column.description: Minimum area of deblended object detection

column.name: dbLevel
column.description: No. of rethresholding levels for deblending

column.name: skySquare
column.description: Blocksize (one side) of sky background

column.name: skyDefn
column.description: Method of defining sky, eg. "median"

column.name: skyFilter
column.description: Box filter weights for sky determination

column.name: fThresh
column.description: Sky filtering parameter

column.name: fSclen
column.description: Scale size for iterative filter application

column.name: pCut
column.description: Threshold "percentage cut" for pixel analysis

column.name: starCat
column.description: Name of reference star catalogue used for astrometric fit

column.name: brightLim
column.description: Bright mag limit for selected astrometric refstars

column.name: faintLim
column.description: Faint limit for selected refstars

column.name: equinRef
column.description: Equinox of refstar positions

column.name: tSysRef
column.description: Time system of equinox of refstar positions, eg. JULIAN

column.name: maxIter
column.description: Maximum no. of iterations for non-linear astrometric fit

column.name: rCritIni
column.description: Initial matching tolerance for refstars

column.name: rCritAbs
column.description: Absolute object rejection criterion

column.name: rCritRel
column.description: Relative object rejection criterion

column.name: rCritFin
column.description: Final residual tolerance

column.name: distType
column.description: Radial distortion term in solution, eg. R/TAN(R)

column.name: scdGrid
column.description: Non-linear distortion mask filename

column.name: raCol
column.description: Name of RA column in reference catalogue

column.name: decCol
column.description: Name of Dec column in reference catalogue

column.name: raPMCol
column.description: Name of RA proper motion column in reference catalogue

column.name: decPMCol
column.description: Name of Dec proper motion column in reference catalogue

column.name: plxCol
column.description: Name of parallax column in reference catalogue

column.name: rvCol
column.description: Name of radial velocity column in reference catalogue

column.name: magCol
column.description: Name of magnitude column in reference catalogue

column.name: cEquinox
column.description: Catalogue equinox

column.name: cEqTSys
column.description: Catalogue equinox time system, eg. JULIAN

column.name: cEpoch
column.description: Catalogue epoch

column.name: cEpTSys
column.description: Catalogue epoch time system, eg. JULIAN

column.description: No. of refstars in initial astrometric solution

column.name: starsSelec

column.name: starsUsed
column.description: No. of refstars in final astrometric solution

column.name: objID
column.description: Unique object identification number

column.name: plateID

column.name: sourceID
column.description: objID for corresponding merged record in Source

column.name: recNum
column.description: The record number in the original IAM file

column.name: ra

column.name: dec
column.description: Celestial Declination

column.name: htmId
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of centroid

column.description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.name: cz
column.description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.name: xmax
column.description: Rightmost extent of image on plate

column.name: ymin
column.description: Bottommost extent of image on plate

column.name: ymax
column.description: Topmost extent of image on plate

column.name: area
column.description: Area within detection isophote

column.name: ipeak
column.description: Intensity of brightest pixel above sky

column.name: cosmag
column.description: Isophotal magnitude

column.name: isky
column.description: Estimate of sky intensity at (xCen, yCen)

column.name: xCen
column.description: Intensity-weighted X-centroid of image

column.name: yCen
column.description: Intensity-weighted Y-centroid of image

column.name: aU
column.description: Semi-major axis of unweighted fitted ellipse

column.name: bU
column.description: Semi-minor axis of unweighted fitted ellipse

column.name: thetaU
column.description: Position angle (wrt x-axis) of unweighted fitted ellipse

column.name: aI
column.description: Semi-major axis of intensity-weighted fitted ellip.

column.name: bI
column.description: Semi-minor axis of intensity-weighted fitted ellip.

column.name: thetaI
column.description: Position angle (wrt x-axis) of intensity-weighted fitted ellipse

column.name: class
column.description: Classification flag

column.name: pa
column.description: Celestial position angle (E of N)

column.name: ap1
column.description: Area above 1st afloat profile threshold

column.name: ap2
column.description: Area above 2nd afloat profile threshold

column.name: ap3
column.description: Area above 3rd afloat profile threshold

column.name: ap4
column.description: Area above 4th afloat profile threshold

column.description: Area above 6th afloat profile threshold

column.name: ap7
column.description: Area above 7th afloat profile threshold

column.name: ap8
column.description: Area above 8th afloat profile threshold

column.name: blend
column.description: Deblend flag: -n=parent of n children; +n = nth child of a parent

column.name: quality
column.description: Bitwise quality flag

column.name: prfStat
column.description: Profile statistic

column.name: prfMag
column.description: Profile magnitude

column.name: gMag
column.description: Magnitude calculated on assumption object is galaxy

column.name: sMag
column.description: Magnitude calculated on assumption object is star

column.name: SSAfield
column.description: SSS field number (ESO/SRC system) that this detection falls in.

column.name: seam
column.description: Seam index: = zero or SSAfield for seamless selection

column.name: objID
column.description: Unique object identification number from Detection

column.name: junkSource
column.description: Source of junk: 1=satellite track; 2=diffraction spike; 3=bright stellar halo

column.name: invSGDens
column.description: Local inverse star/galaxy density

column.name: trackAngle
column.description: Angle of track or diffraction spike

column.name: brightObjID
column.description: The Detection.objID of the artifact-inducing bright star

column.name: haloRadius
column.description: Vertical half-major axis of halo ellipse

column.name: postProb
column.description: Posterior probability of detection being junk

column.name: objID
column.description: Unique identifier of merged source

column.name: neighbourObjID
column.description: Unique identifier of merged source near neighbour

column.name: distanceMins
column.description: The angular separation of the cross-neighbour

column.name: objID
column.description: Unique identifier of merged source

column.description: R2 band magnitude selected by R2 image class

column.name: classMagI
column.description: I band magnitude selected by I image class

column.name: gCorMagB
column.description: B band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

column.name: gCorMagR1
column.description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

column.name: gCorMagR2
column.description: R2 band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

column.name: gCorMagI
column.description: I band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

column.name: sCorMagB
column.description: B band magnitude assuming object is star

column.name: sCorMagR1
column.description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is star

column.name: sCorMagR2
column.description: R2 band magnitude assuming object is star

column.name: sCorMagI
column.description: I band magnitude assuming object is star

column.name: meanClass
column.description: Estimate of image class based on unit-weighted mean of individual classes

column.name: classB
column.description: Image classification from B band detection

column.name: classR1
column.description: Image classification from R1 band detection

column.name: classR2
column.description: Image classification from R2 band detection

column.description: Image classification from I band detection

column.description: Ellipticity of R2 band detection

column.name: ellipI
column.description: Ellipticity of I band detection

column.name: qualR1
column.description: Bitwise quality flag from R1 band detection

column.description: Bitwise quality flag from R2 band detection

column.description: Blend flag from R2 band detection

column.name: blendI
column.description: Blend flag from I band detection

column.name: l
column.description: The Galactic longitude of the source

column.name: b
column.description: The Galactic latitude of the source

column.name: d
column.description: The great-circle distance of the source from the Galactic centre

column.name: Ebmv
column.description: The estimated foreground reddening at this position from Schlegel et al. (1998)

column.name: systemID
column.description: Unique identifier of the system of survey field centres

column.name: fieldID
column.description: Unique identifier of survey field (fieldNum and systemID combo)

column.name: fieldNum
column.description: ESO/SRC or Palomar survey system field number

column.name: nominalRA
column.description: Nominal field centre RA

column.name: nominalDec
column.description: Nominal field centre Dec

column.name: htmId
column.description: Hierarchical Triangular Mesh (20-deep) of nominal field centre

column.name: cx
column.description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.name: cy
column.description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.name: cz
column.description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

column.name: versionID
column.description: Unique identifier for the calibration version

column.name: startDate
column.description: Start date at which the calibration was released

column.name: endDate
column.description: End date at which the calibration was superseded

column.name: description
column.description: Short description of the calibration version

column.name: versionID
column.description: Unique identifier for the calibration version

column.name: plateID
column.description: Unique identifier of the plate

column.name: gradient
column.description: Gradient of the isophotal scale

column.name: zeropoint
column.description: Zeropoint of the isophotal scale

column.name: slump
column.description: Fourth-order radial term in calibration

column.name: colourZP
column.description: Colour zeropoint (wrt Bj) of calibration
